summary: Code appears to initialize a Ruby hoster, allowing for data transmission and function execution as plug-ins. It includes recovery functions and internal network operations, with setup instructions provided for the function pool.

details.comment: Code appears to initialize a Ruby hoster, allowing for data transmission and function execution as plug-ins. It includes recovery functions and internal network operations, with setup instructions provided for the function pool.
details.content:
do the ruby hoster. post data to the server and get the response. must make every function as a plug.
do some recovery shit. like reset all, recover all or so on.
well, say about the internal network. those functions. how do you get them?
a central place for comprehension?
in order to get your ruby thing running, you must set up a function pool.
what you are going to compose? a bunch of keystrokes? time waiting?
